channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-27870|2024-08-04T16:25:43.489Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of SolarWinds Orion Platform 2020.2.1. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within ExportToPDF.aspx. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose information in the context of SYSTEM. Was ZDI-CAN-11917.

item.title: CVE-2021-35238|2024-08-04T00:33:51.272Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: User with Orion Platform Admin Rights could store XSS through URL POST parameter in CreateExternalWebsite website.

item.title: CVE-2021-35216|2024-08-04T00:33:51.219Z -- solarwinds -- patch%20manager
item.description: Insecure Deserialization of untrusted data remote code execution vulnerability was discovered in Patch Manager Orion Platform Integration module. An Authenticated Attacker with network access via HTTP can compromise this vulnerability can result in Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-35242|2024-08-04T00:33:51.281Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u%20server
item.description: Serv-U server responds with valid CSRFToken when the request contains only Session.

item.title: CVE-2021-35245|2024-08-04T00:33:51.270Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u%20ftp
item.description: When a user has admin rights in Serv-U Console, the user can move, create and delete any files are able to be accessed on the Serv-U host machine.

item.title: CVE-2021-35236|2024-08-04T00:33:51.218Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20syslog%20server
item.description: The Secure flag is not set in the SSL Cookie of Kiwi Syslog Server 9.7.2 and previous versions. The Secure attribute tells the browser to only send the cookie if the request is being sent over a secure channel such as HTTPS. This will help protect the cookie from being passed over unencrypted requests. If the application can be accessed over both HTTP, there is a potential for the cookie can be sent in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2021-35228|2024-08-04T00:33:51.200Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds
item.description: This vulnerability occurred due to missing input sanitization for one of the output fields that is extracted from headers on specific section of page causing a reflective cross site scripting attack. An attacker would need to perform a Man in the Middle attack in order to change header for a remote victim.

item.title: CVE-2021-35220|2024-08-04T00:33:51.199Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Command Injection vulnerability in EmailWebPage API which can lead to a Remote Code Execution (RCE) from the Alerts Settings page.

item.title: CVE-2021-35243|2024-08-04T00:33:51.244Z -- solarwinds -- web%20help%20desk
item.description: The HTTP PUT and DELETE methods were enabled in the Web Help Desk web server (12.7.7 and earlier), allowing users to execute dangerous HTTP requests. The HTTP PUT method is normally used to upload data that is saved on the server with a user-supplied URL. While the DELETE method requests that the origin server removes the association between the target resource and its current functionality. Improper use of these methods may lead to a loss of integrity.

item.title: CVE-2021-35226|2024-08-04T00:33:51.270Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: An entity in Network Configuration Manager product is misconfigured and exposing password field to Solarwinds Information Service (SWIS). Exposed credentials are encrypted and require authenticated access with an NCM role.

item.title: CVE-2021-35235|2024-08-04T00:33:51.204Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20syslog%20server
item.description: The ASP.NET debug feature is enabled by default in Kiwi Syslog Server 9.7.2 and previous versions. ASP.NET allows remote debugging of web applications, if configured to do so. Debug mode causes ASP.NET to compile applications with extra information. The information enables a debugger to closely monitor and control the execution of an application. If an attacker could successfully start a remote debugging session, this is likely to disclose sensitive information about the web application and supporting infrastructure that may be valuable in targeting SWI with malicious intent.

item.title: CVE-2021-35231|2024-08-04T00:33:51.285Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20syslog%20server
item.description: As a result of an unquoted service path vulnerability present in the Kiwi Syslog Server Installation Wizard, a local attacker could gain escalated privileges by inserting an executable into the path of the affected service or uninstall entry. Example vulnerable path: "Computer\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Services\Kiwi Syslog Server\Parameters\Application".

item.title: CVE-2021-35222|2024-08-04T00:33:51.294Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: This vulnerability allows attackers to impersonate users and perform arbitrary actions leading to a Remote Code Execution (RCE) from the Alerts Settings page.

item.title: CVE-2021-35251|2024-08-04T00:33:51.272Z -- solarwinds -- web%20help%20desk
item.description: Sensitive information could be displayed when a detailed technical error message is posted. This information could disclose environmental details about the Web Help Desk installation.

item.title: CVE-2021-35223|2024-08-04T00:33:51.260Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: The Serv-U File Server allows for events such as user login failures to be audited by executing a command. This command can be supplied with parameters that can take the form of user string variables, allowing remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-35237|2024-08-04T00:33:51.289Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20syslog%20server
item.description: A missing HTTP header (X-Frame-Options) in Kiwi Syslog Server has left customers vulnerable to click jacking. Clickjacking is an attack that occurs when an attacker uses a transparent iframe in a window to trick a user into clicking on an actionable item, such as a button or link, to another server in which they have an identical webpage. The attacker essentially hijacks the user activity intended for the original server and sends them to the other server. This is an attack on both the user and the server.

item.title: CVE-2021-35230|2024-08-04T00:33:51.226Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20cattools
item.description: As a result of an unquoted service path vulnerability present in the Kiwi CatTools Installation Wizard, a local attacker could gain escalated privileges by inserting an executable into the path of the affected service or uninstall entry.

item.title: CVE-2021-35250|2024-08-04T00:33:51.252Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A researcher reported a Directory Transversal Vulnerability in Serv-U 15.3. This may allow access to files relating to the Serv-U installation and server files. This issue has been resolved in Serv-U 15.3 Hotfix 1.

item.title: CVE-2020-10148|2024-08-04T10:50:57.882Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Orion API is vulnerable to an authentication bypass that could allow a remote attacker to execute API commands. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and execute API commands which may result in a compromise of the SolarWinds instance. SolarWinds Orion Platform versions 2019.4 HF 5, 2020.2 with no hotfix installed, and 2020.2 HF 1 are affected.

item.title: CVE-2021-35247|2024-08-04T00:33:51.288Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: Serv-U web login screen to LDAP authentication was allowing characters that were not sufficiently sanitized. SolarWinds has updated the input mechanism to perform additional validation and sanitization. Please Note: No downstream affect has been detected as the LDAP servers ignored improper characters. To insure proper input validation is completed in all environments. SolarWinds recommends scheduling an update to the latest version of Serv-U.

item.title: CVE-2020-27871|2024-08-04T16:25:43.288Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files on affected installations of SolarWinds Orion Platform 2020.2.1. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed. The specific flaw exists within VulnerabilitySettings.aspx. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM. Was ZDI-CAN-11902.

item.title: CVE-2020-27869|2024-08-04T16:25:43.921Z -- solarwinds -- network%20performance%20monitor
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor 2020 HF1, NPM: 2020.2. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the WriteToFile method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and reset the password for the Admin user. Was ZDI-CAN-11804.

item.title: CVE-2021-35244|2024-08-04T00:33:51.297Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: The "Log alert to a file" action within action management enables any Orion Platform user with Orion alert management rights to write to any file. An attacker with Orion alert management rights could use this vulnerability to perform an unrestricted file upload causing a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-35219|2024-08-04T00:33:51.192Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: ExportToPdfCmd Arbitrary File Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability using ImportAlert function within the Alerts Settings page.

item.title: CVE-2021-35218|2024-08-04T00:33:51.326Z -- solarwinds -- patch%20manager
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data in the Web Console Chart Endpoint can lead to remote code execution. An unauthorized attacker who has network access to the Orion Patch Manager Web Console could potentially exploit this and compromise the server

item.title: CVE-2021-35249|2024-08-04T00:33:51.298Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: This broken access control vulnerability pertains specifically to a domain admin who can access configuration & user data of other domains which they should not have access to. Please note the admin is unable to modify the data (read only operation). This UAC issue leads to a data leak to unauthorized users for a domain, with no log of them accessing the data unless they attempt to modify it. This read-only activity is logged to the original domain and does not specify which domain was accessed.

item.title: CVE-2021-35217|2024-08-04T00:33:51.218Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insecure Deseralization of untrusted data remote code execution vulnerability was discovered in Patch Manager Orion Platform Integration module and reported to us by ZDI. An Authenticated Attacker could exploit it by executing WSAsyncExecuteTasks deserialization of untrusted data.

item.title: CVE-2021-35232|2024-08-04T00:33:51.242Z -- solarwinds -- web%20help%20desk
item.description: Hard coded credentials discovered in SolarWinds Web Help Desk product. Through these credentials, the attacker with local access to the Web Help Desk host machine allows to execute arbitrary HQL queries against the database and leverage the vulnerability to steal the password hashes of the users or insert arbitrary data into the database.

item.title: CVE-2021-35254|2024-08-04T00:33:51.251Z -- solarwinds -- webhelpdesk
item.description: SolarWinds received a report of a vulnerability related to an input that was not sanitized in WebHelpDesk. SolarWinds has removed this input field to prevent the misuse of this input in the future.

item.title: CVE-2021-35239|2024-08-04T00:33:51.271Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: A security researcher found a user with Orion map manage rights could store XSS through via text box hyperlink.

item.title: CVE-2021-35234|2024-08-04T00:33:51.261Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20core
item.description: Numerous exposed dangerous functions within Orion Core has allows for read-only SQL injection leading to privileged escalation. An attacker with low-user privileges may steal password hashes and password salt information.

item.title: CVE-2021-35246|2024-08-04T00:33:51.305Z -- solarwinds -- engineer%27s%20toolset
item.description: The application fails to prevent users from connecting to it over unencrypted connections. An attacker able to modify a legitimate user's network traffic could bypass the application's use of SSL/TLS encryption and use the application as a platform for attacks against its users.

item.title: CVE-2021-35212|2024-08-04T00:33:51.205Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: An SQL injection Privilege Escalation Vulnerability was discovered in the Orion Platform reported by the ZDI Team. A blind Boolean SQL injection which could lead to full read/write over the Orion database content including the Orion certificate for any authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2021-35214|2024-08-04T00:33:51.181Z -- solarwinds -- pingdom
item.description: The vulnerability in SolarWinds Pingdom can be described as a failure to invalidate user session upon password or email address change. When running multiple active sessions in separate browser windows, it was observed a password or email address change could be changed without terminating the user session. This issue has been resolved on September 13, 2021.

item.title: CVE-2021-35215|2024-08-04T00:33:51.252Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insecure deserialization leading to Remote Code Execution was detected in the Orion Platform version 2020.2.5. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-35248|2024-08-04T00:33:51.261Z -- solarwinds -- orion
item.description: It has been reported that any Orion user, e.g. guest accounts can query the Orion.UserSettings entity and enumerate users and their basic settings.

item.title: CVE-2021-35233|2024-08-04T00:33:51.334Z -- solarwinds -- kiwi%20syslog%20server
item.description: The HTTP TRACK & TRACE methods were enabled in Kiwi Syslog Server 9.7.1 and earlier. These methods are intended for diagnostic purposes only. If enabled, the web server will respond to requests that use these methods by returning exact HTTP request that was received in the response to the client. This may lead to the disclosure of sensitive information such as internal authentication headers appended by reverse proxies.

item.title: CVE-2021-35211|2024-08-04T00:33:51.183Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u%20managed%20file%20transfer%20server%20and%20serv-u%20secured%20ftp
item.description: Microsoft discovered a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in the SolarWinds Serv-U product utilizing a Remote Memory Escape Vulnerability. If exploited, a threat actor may be able to gain privileged access to the machine hosting Serv-U Only. SolarWinds Serv-U Managed File Transfer and Serv-U Secure FTP for Windows before 15.2.3 HF2 are affected by this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-35240|2024-08-04T00:33:51.240Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: A security researcher stored XSS via a Help Server setting. This affects customers using Internet Explorer, because they do not support 'rel=noopener'.

item.title: CVE-2021-35225|2024-08-04T00:33:51.241Z -- solarwinds -- npm
item.description: Each authenticated Orion Platform user in a MSP (Managed Service Provider) environment can view and browse all NetPath Services from all that MSP's customers. This can lead to any user having a limited insight into other customer's infrastructure and potential data cross-contamination.

item.title: CVE-2021-35221|2024-08-04T00:33:51.282Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Improper Access Control Tampering Vulnerability using ImportAlert function which can lead to a Remote Code Execution (RCE) from the Alerts Settings page.

item.title: CVE-2021-35213|2024-08-04T00:33:51.227Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: An Improper Access Control Privilege Escalation Vulnerability was discovered in the User Setting of Orion Platform version 2020.2.5. It allows a guest user to elevate privileges to the Administrator using this vulnerability. Authentication is required to exploit the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-35252|2024-08-04T00:33:51.290Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u%20ftp%20server
item.description: Common encryption key appears to be used across all deployed instances of Serv-U FTP Server. Because of this an encrypted value that is exposed to an attacker can be simply recovered to plaintext.

item.title: CVE-2021-35227|2024-08-04T00:33:51.271Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The HTTP interface was enabled for RabbitMQ Plugin in ARM 2020.2.6 and the ability to configure HTTPS was not available.

item.title: CVE-2021-35229|2024-08-04T00:33:51.293Z -- solarwinds -- database%20performance%20monitor
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability is present in Database Performance Monitor 2022.1.7779 and previous versions when using a complex SQL query

item.title: CVE-2023-40057|2024-08-02T18:24:54.690Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-0692|2024-08-01T18:11:35.750Z -- solarwinds -- security%20event%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Security Event Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse SolarWinds’ service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23473|2024-07-30T14:53:20.981Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to contain a hard-coded credential authentication bypass vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows access to the RabbitMQ management console.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-0692|2024-07-25T14:34:11.693Z -- solarwinds -- security%20event%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Security Event Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse SolarWinds’ service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-28072|2024-07-24T17:45:43.053Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A highly privileged account can overwrite arbitrary files on the system with log output. The log file path tags were not sanitized properly.

item.title: CVE-2024-23475|2024-07-22T15:28:43.606Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform arbitrary file deletion and leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-23465|2024-07-19T15:52:58.074Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to an authentication bypass vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to gain domain admin access within the Active Directory environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-23465|2024-07-19T03:55:31.253Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to an authentication bypass vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to gain domain admin access within the Active Directory environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-23472|2024-07-19T03:55:30.537Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to Directory Traversal vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to arbitrary read and delete files in ARM.

item.title: CVE-2024-23475|2024-07-19T03:55:29.093Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform arbitrary file deletion and leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-23469|2024-07-19T03:55:29.839Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to a Remote Code Execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-23466|2024-07-19T03:55:32.687Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28074|2024-07-19T03:55:34.124Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: It was discovered that a previous vulnerability was not completely fixed with SolarWinds Access Rights Manager. While some controls were implemented the researcher was able to bypass these and use a different method to exploit the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23470|2024-07-19T03:55:35.474Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a pre-authentication remote code execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to run commands and executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-23467|2024-07-19T03:55:33.417Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23471|2024-07-19T03:55:34.803Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23470|2024-07-18T13:43:02.097Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a pre-authentication remote code execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to run commands and executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-28993|2024-07-17T18:12:08.211Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform arbitrary file deletion and leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-23467|2024-07-17T18:11:06.340Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23471|2024-07-17T18:19:17.286Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23472|2024-07-17T15:33:59.544Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to Directory Traversal vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to arbitrary read and delete files in ARM.

item.title: CVE-2024-23469|2024-07-17T15:08:48.970Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to a Remote Code Execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-23468|2024-07-17T15:28:16.116Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform arbitrary file deletion and leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-28995|2024-06-21T03:55:51.061Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20serv-u
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was susceptible to a directory transversal vulnerability that would allow access to read sensitive files on the host machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-23476|2024-02-15T20:48:39.529Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve the Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23477|2024-02-15T20:48:50.612Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve a Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23478|2024-02-15T20:48:13.041Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23479|2024-02-15T20:48:01.016Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve a Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23473|2024-05-09T12:43:51.111Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to contain a hard-coded credential authentication bypass vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows access to the RabbitMQ management console.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-29000|2024-06-06T15:36:39.203Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29001|2024-06-04T17:57:23.613Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: A SolarWinds Platform SWQL Injection Vulnerability was identified in the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and user interaction to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-29003|2024-06-04T17:57:46.757Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a XSS vulnerability that affects the maps section of the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and requires user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-29004|2024-06-05T14:18:57.420Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-0692|2024-03-01T08:55:35.848Z -- solarwinds -- security%20event%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Security Event Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse SolarWinds’ service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-28076|2024-06-04T18:03:17.880Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a Arbitrary Open Redirection Vulnerability. A potential attacker can redirect to different domain when using URL parameter with relative entry in the correct format

item.title: CVE-2024-28996|2024-06-05T05:15:36.855Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a SWQL Injection Vulnerability. Attack complexity is high for this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28995|2024-06-10T13:06:50.624Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20serv-u
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was susceptible to a directory transversal vulnerability that would allow access to read sensitive files on the host machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-28075|2024-06-05T16:14:26.541Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-28999|2024-06-06T15:36:31.610Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a Race Condition Vulnerability affecting the web console.

item.title: CVE-2024-28072|2024-05-03T07:50:00.696Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A highly privileged account can overwrite arbitrary files on the system with log output. The log file path tags were not sanitized properly.

item.title: CVE-2024-28073|2024-04-17T16:58:12.353Z -- solarwinds -- servu
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Vulnerability. This vulnerability requires a highly privileged account to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2023-40057|2024-02-15T20:49:04.504Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-28995|2024-06-26T03:55:26.894Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20serv-u
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was susceptible to a directory transversal vulnerability that would allow access to read sensitive files on the host machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-23471|2024-07-17T14:31:28.669Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23467|2024-07-17T14:28:57.869Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23470|2024-07-17T14:30:37.081Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a pre-authentication remote code execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to run commands and executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-28074|2024-07-17T14:29:39.778Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: It was discovered that a previous vulnerability was not completely fixed with SolarWinds Access Rights Manager. While some controls were implemented the researcher was able to bypass these and use a different method to exploit the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23466|2024-07-17T14:28:17.041Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28993|2024-07-17T14:24:42.745Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to perform arbitrary file deletion and leak sensitive information.

item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) is susceptible to Directory Traversal vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to arbitrary read and delete files in ARM.

item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to an authentication bypass vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to gain domain admin access within the Active Directory environment.

item.description: A SolarWinds Platform SWQL Injection Vulnerability was identified in the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and user interaction to be exploited.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a Arbitrary Open Redirection Vulnerability. A potential attacker can redirect to different domain when using URL parameter with relative entry in the correct format

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28075|2024-08-02T00:48:48.249Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Vulnerability. This vulnerability requires a highly privileged account to be exploited.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a XSS vulnerability that affects the maps section of the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and requires user interaction.
